public ref class WizardStepCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type WizardStepCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表做為精靈之控制項中 衍生物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of -derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合-衍生物件，例如做為精靈，控制項中的控制項或控制項。The class is used to store and manage a collection of -derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard, such as the control or the control. 例如，控制使用類別適用於其屬性。For example, the control uses the class for its property. 有多種方法可以存取-衍生中的物件:There are multiple ways you can access the -derived objects in the : - 使用屬性可直接存取-衍生特定的以零為起始索引處的物件。Use the property to directly access a -derived object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法，以建立可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法，將複製的內容集合物件。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以填入使用宣告式語法的集合。The following example demonstrates how to populate the collection using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare/CS/wizardstepcollectiondeclarecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare/VB/wizardstepcollectiondeclarevb.aspx#3)] 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式填入集合。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically populate a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/CS/wizardstepcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/VB/wizardstepcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 以下是上述範例中的網頁的程式碼後置檔案。The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/CS/wizardstepcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/VB/wizardstepcollection.vb#2)]

span.span: Copies all the items from a collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將集合的內容複製到指定以零為起始的陣列。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array. 目標陣列的指定索引處開始複製的項目。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 位於陣列的項目之後，您可以使用陣列語法來存取中的項目集合。After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the collection. 或者，您也可以使用方法來建立列舉值，可以用來存取集合中的項目。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以複製從集合的物件陣列。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from the collection to an array. 陣列會逐一顯示每個屬性-衍生物件。The array is then iterated through to display the property of each -derived object. 請注意，在此範例中，屬性控制項是的執行個體類別。Note that in the example, the property of the control is an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo/CS/wizardstepcollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo/VB/wizardstepcollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]
